data.title: The DIRECTV Channel Lineup | The Best TV Packages with Your Favorite Channels
data.meta_description: Discover the DIRECTV channel lineup with over 200 channels, including top sports networks, local channels, and premium options like HBO Max.

Get DIRECTV now

By Randy Harward

Aug 15, 2024 | Share

5-day free trial: Tired of cable and satellite TV but not quite sure if you want to cut the cord? DIRECTV STREAM is a good streaming alternative for folks who want the look and feel of old-school TV without the installation requirements, equipment fees, and other headaches that come with cable.

DIRECTV has four packages (ENTERTAINMENT, CHOICE, ULTIMATE, and PREMIER), each with a unique channel lineup. Lucky for you, we’ve put together a complete list for you to compare below.

Note: The DIRECTV and DIRECTV STREAM channel lineups are now essentially the same. The information below covers you for both services.

Curious what TV providers are in your area?

Please enter a valid zip code.

DIRECTV channel lineup

Below are the DIRECTV channel lineups (which, again, are the same as the DIRECTV STREAM channel lineups, minus a few noted exceptions). Click a letter to speed up your search for your favorite channels.

DIRECTV regional sports networks

Depending on where you live, the DIRECTV channel lineup—in the CHOICE package and higher—may include several regional sports networks (RSNs).

If you want more regional sports access, you can include DIRECTV SPORTS PACK with your plan and get around 40 more out-of-market networks. We highlight this add-on and many others on our DIRECTV Sports Packages page.

To see which DIRECTV RSNs are available in your area, enter your zip code on DIRECTV’s local RSN lookup tool.

DIRECTV channel lineups FAQ

What are my local channels on DIRECTV?

DIRECTV local channels—ABC, CBS, The CW, FOX, NBC, and Spanish-language stations like Telemundo, UniMás, Univision, and Universo—vary by region and will have different channel numbers. If your DIRECTV Guide shows the wrong channels, you can try these steps:

1. From your Home screen, select Settings > General > System Summary.

2. Under System Summary, check your ZIP code. If it’s wrong, go to Step 3.

3. Select Location, then Location Status. Turn it to OFF.

4. Restart your DIRECTV Genie (or other DIRECTV device) by pressing the red button located on its side.

5. When your DIRECTV Genie powers back on, turn Location Status back to ON.

How can I get a list of channels on DIRECTV?

To get a list of DIRECTV channels, try these methods:

DIRECTV on-screen guide: To see the most current list of DIRECTV channels, select Guide on the DIRECTV home screen.

Printable PDF list: This printable list of DIRECTV channels is current as of Jan. 8, 2024. It says it’s the DIRECTV channel lineup, but you can consider it the DIRECTV STREAM channel lineup since the packages are the same for both services.

What is DIRECTV's streaming channel lineup?

As of Jan. 8, 2024, the DIRECTV STREAM channel lineup is the same as the DIRECTV channel lineup.

What channel is ESPN on DIRECTV?

You can watch ESPN on DIRECTV’s channel 206.

What channel is ABC on DIRECTV?

Depending on where you live, ABC’s channel number changes on the DIRECTV channel lineup. Here are the channel numbers for the most-searched cities:

Boise, ID: CH 6

Colorado Springs, CO: CH 13

El Paso, TX: CH 7

Houston, TX: CH 13

Las Vegas, NV: CH 7

Los Angeles, CA: CH 7

Miami, FL: CH 10

San Antonio, TX: CH 12

San Diego, CA: CH 10

Tucson, AZ: CH 9

Tulsa, OK: CH 8

What channel is CBS on DIRECTV?

DIRECTV changes CBS’s channel number based on where you live. For a more comprehensive list of CBS channel numbers, check out our What Channel Is CBS On? guide. Otherwise, here are the channel numbers for the most-searched cities:

Boise, ID: CH 2

Colorado Springs, CO: CH 11

El Paso, TX: CH 4

Houston, TX: CH 11

Las Vegas, NV: CH 2

Los Angeles, CA: CH 2

Miami, FL: CH 4

San Antonio, TX: CH 5

San Diego, CA: CH 8

Tucson, AZ: CH 13

Tulsa, OK: CH 6

What channel is CNN on DIRECTV?

CNN is channel 202 on DIRECTV.

What channel is FOX on DIRECTV?

You’ll find FOX on a different channel depending on where you live. If you’re having trouble finding yours on the DIRECTV channel lineup, here are the channel numbers for the most-searched cities:

Boise, ID: CH 9

Colorado Springs, CO: CH 21

El Paso, TX: CH 14

Houston, TX: CH 26

Las Vegas, NV: CH 11

Los Angeles, CA: CH 11

Miami, FL: CH 7

San Antonio, TX: CH 29

San Diego, CA: CH 69

Tucson, AZ: CH 11

Tulsa, OK: CH 23

What channel is FOX News on DIRECTV?

You can watch FOX News on DIRECTV channel 360.

What channel is NBC on DIRECTV?

The NBC channel number on DIRECTV varies depending on your location. Our What Channel is NBC On? page offers a more comprehensive NBC channel list for major US cities, but here are some of the channel numbers in the most-searched cities:

Boise, ID: CH 7

Colorado Springs, CO: CH 5

El Paso, TX: CH 9

Houston, TX: CH 2

Las Vegas, NV: CH 4

Los Angeles, CA: CH 4

Miami, FL: CH 6

San Antonio, TX: CH 4

San Diego, CA: CH 39

Tucson, AZ: CH 4

Tulsa, OK: CH 2

Which DIRECTV channels are in 4K Ultra HD?

The DIRECTV channel lineup has six 4K Ultra-HD channels:

Channel 104: Documentaries, original programs, and other shows in 4K

Channel 105: Live sporting events in 4K

Channel 106: Live sporting events in 4K

Channel 107: Pay-per-view movies in 4K

Channel 108: Pay-per-view movies in 4K

Channel 1104: On-demand content in 4K

As a self-proclaimed DIRECTV guide, we can say that the provider needs to up its 4K game. But it’ll probably take a few years before it catches up to your TV setup.

What channels are we losing on DIRECTV?

In 2023, DIRECTV lost the NFL SUNDAY TICKET, an out-of-market football TV package that carried every regional Sunday football game regardless of location. To get your fix of out-of-market games in the 2024–2025 season, you’ll have to subscribe to the rebranded NFL Sunday Ticket via YouTube TV.

Where can I see other TV provider channel guides?

Not satisfied with the DIRECTV channel lineup? That’s fine. Check out other large TV providers’ (traditional and live TV streaming) channel lists below.

DISH channel guide

Xfinity channel guide

Spectrum channel guide

Sling TV channel guide

YouTube TV channel guide

Why you should trust us

Our TV-watching experts have spent hundreds of hours researching all of the big cable and satellite TV providers to bring you up-to-date information on their plans, prices, and channel lineups. For more on our process, head over to How We Rank.
